B. 59 '05 (Copied Feb. 4 '05) L.B. 38, p. 173. 


     The nurses connected with these institutions should be prepared to exert a soul-saving influence. Those who are not rooted and grounded in the truth should not be employed. Let them first become established in the truth. Then let them learn to be ever on guard, ever seeking to make the right impression on the minds of the sick. . . 


                              -78-
